description:
The first match of the ultimate stage pits Tokoha versus Misaki of the legendary Q4! If Tokoha loses, TRY3 won`t have the chance to help take down Ryuzu Myoujin, but does she even have a chance against Misaki`s incredible memory?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kessen! Team Q4 Tokoha vs Misaki
Showdown! Team Q4 Tokoha Versus Misaki
決戦! チームQ4 トコハVSミサキ
